meanings.definition: A substance applied to the skin to prevent or reduce sweating.
meanings.sent1: I used antiperspirants before going to the gym to avoid sweating too much.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new brand of antiperspirants to help with her sweating issue.
meanings.sent3: The antiperspirants worked so well that I felt like a desert in the middle of summer.
meanings.sent4: The antiperspirants acted like a shield against the sweat, keeping me dry all day.
meanings.sent5: The antiperspirants were like magic potions that stopped the sweat in its tracks.

meanings.definition: A product used to control perspiration and odor.
meanings.sent1: My favorite antiperspirants not only stop sweat but also keep me smelling fresh.
meanings.sent2: The store had a wide selection of antiperspirants to choose from.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally sprayed the antiperspirants in my eyes, and now I smell like a flower shop.
meanings.sent4: The antiperspirants were like bodyguards protecting me from embarrassing odors.
meanings.sent5: Using antiperspirants makes me feel confident and odor-free all day long.
